【考法 1】 adj. 不直接的, 迂回的：not being forthright or direct in language or action
【例】We took a circuitous route to the airport so as to avoid the massive traffic jam. 我们走了一条迂回的路线去机场来躲避堵车。
【近】circuitous, indirect, circular, roundabout
【反】direct, straight, straight forward,straight forwardness, direction 直接
【派】circuity n. 不直接：lack of straightforwardness
【考法 2】 adj. 冗长的：using or containing more words than necessary to express an idea
【例】a circuitous explanation for what seems like a fairly basic concept
【近】circuitous, circumlocutory, diffuse弥漫的；散开的, long-winded, prolix冗长的；说话啰嗦的, rambling, verbose, windy
【反】compact, concise, pithy, succinct, terse 简洁的
